## Bio


Guy Twa is a Genetics, Genomics and Bioinformatics Ph.D. candidate in the Day Lab at the University of Alabama at Birmingham. His research utilizes computational biology and machine learning approaches to characterize genomic regulatory interactions and their dysregulation in neurobiology.
